text:
Message 1990 of 4024
Yes I told him. I’m running errands.
Ro you are not allowed in the house.
Sent:03/08/2024 at 03:07 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/08/2024 at 03:11 PM)
Subject:Re: Thanks
Message 1991 of 4024
You don’t read messages
Sent:03/08/2024 at 03:13 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/09/2024 at 04:18 AM)
Subject:Re: Thanks
Message 1992 of 4024
I want to apologize.
I am super frustrated with the situation. It was finally exacerbated by having plans to see AD and having you step in and stop it. I appreciate that we
chatted, and we were able to get everything back on track. But seeing you with your hair down just does something to me, and I regressed. I won't do
that anymore. I need to get over it, and I mostly am. I just had a bad moment.
I hope you will accept that in the context of our really shitty situation and hope you can afford some grace for a brokenhearted husband and Dad who
thought his family and life was settled.
Sent:03/08/2024 at 03:45 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/09/2024 at 04:17 AM)
Subject:Re: Thanks
Message 1993 of 4024
I see it’s been six hours since you checked in and assume you are doing your thing. We should really have some way to reach you. It’s really not
acceptable parenting so let’s please work on that.
Sent:03/08/2024 at 09:05 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/09/2024 at 04:17 AM)
Subject:Emergency
Message 1994 of 4024
13 hours
Sent:03/09/2024 at 07:40 AM
From:Robert Moyer
